page.shortlink: api string dictionary dot get function
page.description: Get a value from a dictionary.
page.prototype: Data_Value as C = Get as c(name as c)

argument.name: Data_Value
argument.description: Character data to be saved in the dictionary.

page.discussion: The .GET() method returns the value of an entry in a StringDictionary list.
page.example: dim sd as StringDictionary sd.set("abc", "3") ? sd.get("abc") = "3"
